body:
Comment 2 by **emepyc**: 
After updating it seems that "--functions" is working fine, but "--lines" or "--files"
don't:

22:03:48:pignatelli ~/src/tests$ gopprof --text --lines ./d24b d24b.prof 
Total: 3066 samples
    1492  48.7%   48.7%     1492   48.7%   syscall.Syscall ?
      952  31.1%   79.7%       968   31.6%    MHeap_AllocLocked ?
      300    9.8%   89.5%       300     9.8%    main.OnMemoryÂ·Encode ?
      113    3.7%   93.2%       248     8.1%    sweep ?
        55    1.8%   95.0%       136     4.4%    runtime.MCache_Free ?
[...]

23:40:29:pignatelli ~/src/tests$ gopprof --text --files ./d24b d24b.prof 
Total: 3066 samples
    3066 100.0% 100.0%     3066 100.0% ?


Thanks,

M;
